SUB_W12_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Holy wow, it is COLD here!
And not just in the temperature
sense—it's more than that.

SUB_W12_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
It's almost like the Calamity had its way
with this world, 'cause people are frozen—
heck, entire TOWNS are frozen!

SUB_W12_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
There's a power filling this world that I'm
not familiar with. It isn't magic, exactly,
but what IS it?

SUB_W12_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.text:
It's almost like the Calamity had its way
with this world, 'cause people are frozen—
heck, entire TOWNS are frozen!
Could my cat really be here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh wow, lady! You're not frozen!
Boy, am I ever glad to see you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_01.text:
And I'm glad to see YOU!
Are you from here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_02.text:
I sure am, ma'am! My name's Alexandre.
Are you visiting?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Yep! My name's Ameya Aisling.
So, uh, how'd everyone get frozen?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_04.text:
I wish I knew. Everything was normal when I went
down into the mine this morning, but when I came
back up? Boom! Everything was frozen solid.
I figure it's because of the curse, but...

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh, right. You wouldn't know about that, huh?
So, there was this emperor a long time ago.
He died cursing the people of Grelon, saying he'd
eventually freeze them right down to their hearts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_06.text:
I guess 'eventually' turned out
to be today.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_07.text:
But why today? And why aren't you frozen?
Did you do something to cause this, Alexandre?
Be honest with me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_08.text:
What? No! I didn't do anything,
Miss Aisling, I swear! As for why I'm not frozen, the only thing
I can think of is that it has something to do
with these matches I brought into the mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_09.text:
Their light is supposed to ward off evil,
so maybe they kept me from freezing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_10.text:
Well then, maybe you can also
use 'em to thaw people out!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Hey, that's a good idea! Will you come
with me while I try to unfreeze people?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_14.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_14.text:
Incidentally, have you seen
a cat around here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_15.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_15.text:
No, sorry. But maybe one
of the frozen people did?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_16.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_16.text: But I have no idea what I'm doing!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_01.text:
I was about to say the same to you!
But hey, have you seen a cat around here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_02.text:
A cat? No, I haven't seen a cat.
But I HAVE seen everyone frozen solid!
Er, you don't think that's strange?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_03.text:
Everyone's frozen, but you're not?
Not really a hard nut to crack,
but it's also not my business. So my name is Ameya Aisling, and I'm a witch.
I'm here looking for a cat—it's kind of a
witch thing—and I'm pretty sure you're
supposed to point me in the right direction.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_04.text:
Gee, lady. At first I was relieved to see
another unfrozen person, but it seems like
you're out of your mind. Why would I be pointing you to anything
when everyone I know is frozen solid!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_07.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_07.text:
Don't try to trick me with kid stories!
I mean, if you're the only one not frozen,
it's kinda obvious you're behind it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.text:
Matches that drive off evil, huh?
You know, with a little help from
my magic, you might be able to use
those to melt some of this ice.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_11.text:
Then we have to try! Oh, and my
name's Alexandre, by the way.
Will you help me unfreeze everyone?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_13.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_13.text: Leave me out of it, Mr. Freeze!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_14.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_14.text:
One thing first, though: have
you seen a cat around here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_03.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_03.text:
My name is Ameya Aisling, and as a witch,
I see frozen people, like, all the time.
So why are you the only one who ISN'T frozen?
Oh, and also, what's your name?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_04.text:
I'm Alexandre. I don't know anything
about this, and didn't have anything
to do with it! Honestly, it's probably the curse of the
final emperor; he swore with his dying breath
that he'd freeze everyone in Grelon
right down to their hearts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_05.text:
I'm guessing this is all happening because
of the curse—and that the reason I'm not
frozen is because of these matches.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_07.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_07.text:
Wowzers, that's some powerful magic.
Are there magic users on this world?
Also, who gave you those matches?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_08.text:
I... Oh, weird! I don't know who gave them to me!
I found them in my pocket this morning, which is
why I decided to go into the mine, but everything
before that is a blank.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.text:
Hmmm. It's pretty clear that someone on
this world commands a whole lot of magic—
and also that they're up to something! I should probably just get my cat and go,
but I'm worried about Alexandre.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_10.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_10.text:
Well, Alexandre, I bet you could thaw out
the people here if you used those matches. Problem is, that's probably just what the
person who gave you the matches WANTS
you to do. 'Cause I mean, they're clearly
using you for something.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_11.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_11.text:
So knowing that, do you still want to
unfreeze everyone? It's your choice,
so don't rush into it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_12.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_12.text: I don't care! I want to save everyone!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_13.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_13.text: I don't want to be used. That's...scary.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_14.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_14.text:
Well, since you're being so noble,
I guess I could help you out.
By the way, have you seen a cat?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_16.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_16.text:
Yeah, I know the feeling. If you didn't
freeze these people, it's not on you
to try and fix it.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_800_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_800_00.text:
I've only got eight matches left, which is
probably not enough to save everyone.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_00.text:
We've already used half the matches.
There's only four left.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_00.text: We've only got one match left.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_01.text:
Think hard about who you
want to use it on!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_00.text:
That was the last match.
We can't save anyone else.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_01.text:
And there isn't anything more I can do,
so I guess I'll just let the people
of this world finish the job.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_02.text:
No, Miss Aisling! Please don't say that!
I want to find some way to save everyone!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Look, I only came here
to find a lost cat...

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_05.text: And I need to find it NOW!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Okay, fine. Let's think here for a second.
Everyone's weird frozen dreams all had
one thing in common: the final emperor.
So tell me about him. What's he like?

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_07.text:
They say he cast the last rays of light upon
an empire standing on the brink of collapse.
He ended up confined in his palace when his
people rebelled, and then the empire crumbled.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_08.text: Is that his palace right there?

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_09.text:
If so, we should go check it out! I bet we'll
find something in there that could help us
thaw out the rest of the people here.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Happy to help! I feel like it's important
that I save you—for both of us.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_13.text:
Sorry, but this was never really my
problem in the first place, y'know?
Anyway, I've got a cat to find!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_01.text:
Look, Alexandre. The final emperor was the
common thread in everyone's dreams, so you
guys just need to get to the bottom of
that whole mystery. Good luck!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_03.text:
This kid has been my primary suspect from the
start, and I'm still not sure he's innocent.
Also, I still haven't found any sign of my cat.
Ugh. What a freakin' mess. What to do...?

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_06.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_06.text:
All right, Alexandre. We'll go solve
the final emperor's mystery together.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_07.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_07.text:
Oh, thank you, Miss Aisling!
So the palace where he was sealed
away is at the top of that hill.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_08.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_08.text: Then let's go check it out!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_03.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_03.text:
I still don't know who froze this world, 
or who gave Alexandre those matches.
Can I really just walk away from a
humungous mystery like this?

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_05.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_05.text: Nope. I need my cat and my power.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_06.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_06.text:
We still don't know why your world was frozen,
or who gave you those matches. All we know
is that the answers have something to do with
this final emperor guy.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_07.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_07.text:
Thank you for helping, Miss Aisling,
The palace where he was sealed away
is right at the top of that hill.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_00.text:
That was the last of the matches.
We can't save anyone else.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Well, if Alexandre's giving up,
I guess it's time to go look for my cat.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_02.text: Are you really going to quit, Alexandre?

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_03.text: There's no shame in tapping out.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_04.text: But there's nothing else I can do!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Okay, so the one thing all the weird dreams
had in common was that final emperor guy.
So talk to me! What was he like?

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_06.text:
They say he cast the last rays of light upon
an empire standing on the brink of collapse.
He ended up confined in his palace when his
people rebelled, and then the empire crumbled.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_07.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_07.text: The palace up on the hill?

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_08.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_08.text:
Well then, let's go check it out! I bet we'll
find something in there that could help us
thaw out the rest of the people here.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_09.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_09.text:
You're right, I shouldn't give up.
I'm really sorry.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_10.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_10.text:
Hey, if we let it end here, I'll never find out
what I was supposed to do in this world,
so I gotta see it through to the end.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_11.text:
I'll try not to lose hope like that
again, Miss Aisling. I promise.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_12.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_12.text:
Aw, you've done great, Alexandre.
There's nothing to be ashamed about.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_01.text:
My primary suspect wants to give up?
Man, was I wrong about him all along?

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_05.text:
Everyone's dreams involved the final emperor,
which means he holds the key to this thing.
Now let's get the bottom of the mystery!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_06.text:
You're right, Miss Aisling! If we do that,
we might be able to unfreeze everyone! And, um, I'm sorry for giving up.
I shouldn't have done that.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_08.text:
The final emperor's palace is on top
of that hill. Let's go!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_210_CUT_000_01.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MATCHES_210_CUT_000_01.text:
If Alexandre gives up at this point, what does
that mean for whoever gave him those matches?
I suppose whatever they were planning ends in
failure, which might be for the best.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, that's Leia! Leia! Hey, Leia!
LEIA, CAN YOU HEAR ME!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_010.text:
Whoa, hey! Calm down!
Is this person a friend of yours?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_020.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, Leia is wonderful! She's a scholar
on a survey team who knows all sorts
of fascinating stories about the past.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_030.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_030.text:
Wow, that's impressive. She sounds like a
real smart cookie, which means she probably
knows something about how stuff got frozen.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_040.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_999_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm going to use a match to save her.
Are you ready?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Hey there! My name's Ameya. Do you know
anything about how the world got frozen?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_170.text:
I have no idea, though perhaps Alexandre
will learn something by thawing the other
victims. Will you keep helping him for us?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Oh, you bet! After all, I've got a question
of my own that I need answered.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_000_CUT_000_190.text:
I don't know if I can answer this question
of yours, but I'm happy to try.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: Hello, Alexandre. What brings you to Duvall?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
The library. We're hoping to do
some research on ancient symbols.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: How scholarly of you! Well, I know you could learn a great deal about them from Nicolas Flamel's Encyclopaedia Alchemica, but I fear it is an extremely dangerous book. Its most important page is protected by mighty guardian beasts charged with keeping its secrets; even Leia from the survey team has decided not to attempt it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
That just makes me all the more certain
there's useful stuff in there!
Now gimme that book!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
In that case, I'll go prepare our
sturdiest room for you. Good luck.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
Oooh, I sense a VERY strong power
emanating from this page...

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
Miss Aisling? The text says not to touch.
So, um... Are you sure you want to?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
Are you kidding? That just makes
me want to touch it MORE!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
I don't think we have enough artifacts
to make this shape.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
Then we'll just have to find more!
Let's go talk to everyone again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text: Boy, this slope sure is steep...

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
C'mon, where'd your confidence go?
Morgane would laugh her butt off
if she could hear you now!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
That's what I DON'T want her to do,
which is why I said it!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Aw, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to tease.
Look, all you have to do is fail,
which is about the easiest thing ever.
You've got nothing to worry about!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I know—but I'd still rather do it
right once and impress Morgane!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
This must be what that ghost
wanted to tell us about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I suppose—but I still don't understand
why it would only come out if we failed
at a skiing challenge.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I guess the message is that there are some
things you only learn through failure.
Er, or whatever? Let's go with that.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I did it! I actually pulled it off!
Morgane is going to think I'm SO cool!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Hooray! Er, I mean, boo, Alexandre! Booooo!
We need to FAIL here, remember?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Whoops! That's right. It felt so good
to be skiing that I completely forgot!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Do it again—and get it right this time!
Er, I mean, get it wrong?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text:
It may be dangerous, but I think we
still have to search this old tunnel.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text: I'm counting on you, Miss Aisling!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Where there's fiends, there's artifacts!
I mean, right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Help! Fiends! Fiends appeared out
of nowhere and tore my fields apart!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Wow, that's terrible. Do you think it's
related to the curse of the final emperor?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
I have no idea, but we should
probably help out regardless.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: Well, Alexandre! You saved me again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Wait, you think ALEXANDRE saved you?
That's an interesting interpretation
of what just happened.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
I can't offer much in thanks, but you can
take anything you like from the windmill.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
I wonder if this place is
full of ancient treasure.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: All I see are bags of flour.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Wait, hold on... Isn't this an artifact?
What's it even doing here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Guillaume said we could take whatever
we wanted, so we're all good here!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Hmmm. But this might be precious to
Guillaume—I'd feel bad if we didn't at
least ask him first.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: I was thinking the same thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Have you heard about any ancient artifacts
being found in this mine, Esperance?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
This is a mine, not an archaeological site.
Also, the other mines are still frozen,
and I have my hands VERY full dealing
with all of them at the moment. Now perhaps you can go unfreeze those
other mines and stop pestering me with
all of these inane questions?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
What are YOU apologizing for!?
You're working your butt off to save
all of these people! And you! Esperance!
Maybe cut the attitude a bit!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Yes, I suppose he did save my life... My apologies, Alexandre. I've been terribly
busy trying to find out what's going on in
the other mines, and I fear it's left my
temper rather frayed.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
In that case, we'll check them out for you!
If I see anything out of the ordinary,
I'll come let you know right away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
That would be a huge help.
Thank you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text: Do be careful out there, all right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text:
Did you volunteer to do this
because you thought you might
find an artifact in here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text: The thought did cross my mind... Let's see what we can find!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text:
Guess I shouldn't have figured
it would come so easy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Why did you agree to help
gather firewood, Alexandre?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Because this could also be
connected to the artifacts!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text:
I guess that makes sense.
Okay then, let's get to it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text:
Well, that was a big goose egg as
far as artifacts were concerned.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text: I know. Also, this wood was really heavy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text: All this hard work for nothing!

SUB_W12_GIMK_AMYA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_GIMK_AMYA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: Hang on, I think an artifact just fell out! So Virgile really did see one in the woods!

SUB_W12_GIMK_AMYA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_GIMK_AMYA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text:
Virgile didn't even remember finding it!
And besides, we don't want to drag him
into this if we don't have to.

SUB_W12_GIMK_AMYA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_GIMK_AMYA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text:
Virgile was the one who found this,
so we should probably get his
permission before we just take it.

SUB_W12_GIMK_AMYA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_GIMK_AMYA_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: I was thinking the same thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Wow, this inscription is ancient!
Looks like this world used magic
in the past, too.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Hmm, let me see... 'When the divine sword
was sealed in ice by the devil's power,
our god used the might of spring light to...' Sorry, Miss Aisling, but the word for 'melt'
has disappeared from the translation.
I think someone actually erased it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Good thing it's still preserved in the inscription
itself. This symbol corresponds to the missing
part, so this must be their word for 'melt.'

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
I don't think we have enough
artifacts to make this shape.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Okay, then let's do another loop
and try to find some more.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_00.text:
These must be the bathhouse ruins we
heard about. I know I could sure use
a good soak right about now!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_01.text: Miss Aisling, look at this graffiti!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_02.text:
That looks like that seal we saw!
Can you read it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Hmm... It's a really old language, so I'm not
entirely sure, but I think it says something
like, 'These baths should all freeze!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_04.text:
What sort of lunatic curses a bathhouse?
Can't even imagine what's going on in
the head of whoever wrote that.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_05.text:
And sadly, that seems to be the
only interesting thing here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.text:
These must be the watchtower
ruins we heard about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_010.text: Miss Aisling, look at this graffiti!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.text:
That looks like that seal we saw!
Can you read this?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hmm... It's really old language, so I'm not
entirely sure, but I think it says something
like, 'Freeze, you creepy peepers!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I bet someone from the palace wrote it.
Maybe even the final emperor himself!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.text:
And sadly, that seems to be the
only interesting thing here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_000.text:
These must be the ruins of the church we
heard about. Not exactly the greatest
place for a witch to visit.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_010.text: Miss Aisling, look at this graffiti!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_020.text:
That looks like that seal we saw!
Can you read this?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hmm... The words being used are really old,
so I'm not entirely sure, but I think it says
something like, 'Freeze, church!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The church must have had a lot of power 
if someone hated it so much that they
wanted it frozen solid.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_050.text:
And sadly, that seems to be the
only interesting thing here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_000.text: This is one of those artifacts, isn't it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, I don't think we have quite
enough of these to open the seal.
Let's go visit some other places.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_RUINS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
That should be enough artifacts to open
the seal! Let's head back to the palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So this is the final emperor's palace?
Can't wait to see what's inside!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text: Wait, Miss Aisling! Thing is, for as long as I can remember, I've heard the palace is cursed and that I should never, ever, ever go in there.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
C'mon, that's just something people say
to scare kids! I mean, you don't REALLY
believe in curses, do you?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, um... Yes? Otherwise why
is everyone frozen? Well, whether I believe or not, we're not
getting inside. Those gates won't open, and even
though those walls look climbable, there are
other invisible walls that block you off.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So the whole area has been sealed off?
That makes sense, considering something
like a magical seal has been placed
over the gates here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I sense great power here—everyone who lives
near this place can feel it. That's why we've
been worried all this time that the curse of
the final emperor is real.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Which is all the more reason to solve this
whole final emperor mystery! Problem is,
I can't break this seal with my own magic.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Maybe the members of the survey team could
tell us more about the final emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
It's no good, Miss Aisling—we can't get through.
The gates won't open, and there are invisible
walls all around. Um, I mean, unless you know
something I don't?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
So the whole palace has been sealed off
by some magical force? Hmm...

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
But we CAN get inside if we can break the seal,
so let's ask those people from the survey team
if they know anything!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Say, Leia? Do you happen to know how to
open the gates to the final emperor's palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_010.text:
You know as well as I that there's no way inside
that palace. If there was, I'd already be in there
giggling with archaeological delight!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Is there anything that could help us open
that seal? A hint or a riddle or whatever?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_030.text:
You, Miss Aisling, are no normal traveler
if you can discern the seal in those gates
at a mere glance.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_040.text: Hey, it's what I do! Er, or what I will do when I'm done with my Witchterms, at any rate.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Fair enough. That said, we're not exactly
experts ourselves. Indeed, the knowledge and
techniques involved in commanding this sort of
invisible power have long since been lost to us. All we know is that the pieces of the gates'
seal were scattered and likely discarded.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_060.text: So there were a whole lot of 'em?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_070.text:
We believe the adherents of the final emperor
spent a great deal of time assembling the pieces
of that seal. Sadly, this all happened centuries
ago, and the details have been lost to time.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_080.text:
We'd hoped our recent excavation of historical
sites would turn up the rest of the pieces.
Not because we're followers of the final emperor,
mind; it's merely due to scholarly interest.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_090.text:
Okay, thanks! That's super helpful.
Now at least we know the pieces
are out there somewhere.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_100.text:
But those pieces could be anywhere
in Grelon! We'll never find them all!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_LEIA_100_CUT_000_110.text:
Not with that attitude we won't!
Look, finding all of them means a lot
to me, too, which means I KNOW we'll
succeed if we put our minds to it!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_05.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_05.text:
But someone who isn't from this
country—say, oh, maybe a witch?
Could she enter the palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_14.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_14.text:
So there's a key somewhere in this world?
Well then, let's get out there and find it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Huh? Why didn't it work?
What are we missing?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, we saw a symbol like this in the ruins.
It's the part of the curse that freezes things,
and no variation of it will do anything else.
This isn't going to open the seal for us.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Um, could we maybe melt it?
If only I still had some matches...

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Oh my gosh, of COURSE! If we use the symbol
for 'thaw,' that should break the seal!
Look at the big brain on Alexandre!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Er, but do you know the symbol
for thaw, Miss Aisling?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Nope—but I bet someone who knows
more about this stuff would!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Oh yeah! Maybe we could find
something at the library in Duvall
or the museum in Varsailles!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You heard everyone's dreams about
the final emperor, right, Miss Aisling?
So what's your sense of him now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Those dreams all seemed TERRIBLE!
Although less so for some, I guess.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Those dreams sounded GREAT!
Er, but not for everybody, I guess.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Those dreams were all over the place.
I have no idea what to think.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
like there's something awful waiting for us!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
there's something wonderful waiting for us!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
like things are about to get complicated.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Well, whatever's waiting for us in there,
we've made our choice.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text: Leia? What are you doing here!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
I want to go with you to the final emperor's
palace. As a scholar, I have a great desire
to be one of the first to see it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
That's fine with me if it's
okay with Miss Aisling.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
Hey, you can't ever have too many
experts around, am I right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text: Gabriel? What are you doing here!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
It seems I couldn't put my research behind me
after all; I just can't pass up a chance to
enter the final emperor's palace!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
That's fine with me if it's
okay with Miss Aisling.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
Hey, you can't ever have too many
experts around, am I right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Long have I sought one who possesses a power such
as yours! Indeed, I am in awe of how effortlessly
you broke the seal that had flummoxed so many for
so long. You have my eternal gratitude.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Alexandre, you butt! You could have
been honest with me from the start!
Or should I call you...the final emperor!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
For the moment, I remain merely Alexandre.
But once I reclaim the power sealed away in
the palace, the true emperor shall be reborn!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So you're saying this isn't set in stone?
That the final emperor may not end up
resurrected after all?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text: Would you look to deny me?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, I sure don't appreciate being lied to!
But honestly? I don't care. It's the people
of this world who have everything to gain
or lose here, so they should make the call. I do have to ask one thing, though:
Are you really gonna thaw everyone out?
Or was that also a lie?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
It was no lie, Miss Aisling—I fully intend
to unfreeze them all, for they are His
most valued subjects. But I have another boon to beg: I would have you
destroy the being sealing away the emperor's
power, for I have not the ability to do so myself—
and without that, I cannot unfreeze the others.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wow, look at the stones on you! I mean,
I was willing to help you out before,
but you are REALLY pushing it. Still, if that's your last request,
I'll do it—but let the world know
it was Ameya Aisling who revived
the final emperor!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Thank you, Miss Aisling—I trust you
prefer me to express my gratitude
in the form of Alexandre?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Actually, I don't ever want to
talk to that lying liar again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Then this will be the last time you shall.
But should you visit Grelon again, know that
you will be most welcome here. Farewell, Miss Aisling. I pray you meet
with success in the rest of your mission.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
I'm almost afraid to find out
what'll happen to Grelon now.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Well, nothing to do but find 
that cat and get out of here!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text: Uh, sorry? Was that you, Alexandre?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
There never was an 'Alexandre.' The boy you knew
was a mere phantom I created to manipulate people
into breaking the seal on my palace—a seal which
has now been very much sundered.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
What, you think you were manipulating me? Not even!
I was obeying my own destiny every step of the way,
and every choice I made was my own. So what happens
now wasn't engineered by you, but by ME!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
What happens now is that I will arise again
to reign forevermore as the eternal emperor.
Do you truly claim this to be an action of your
choosing? That your will alone grants me life?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text: No, because what actually happens now is that the final emperor's resurrection fails and he ends up sealed away for all eternity.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Pathetic fool! You misunderstand the extent
of my power, and will pay for your hubris by
becoming a sacrifice in my resurrection rite!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
Well, that should take the fight out of the
final emperor for a while—and hopefully
thaw out everybody who's still frozen!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
I dunno what happened to Alexandre,
but maybe I'm happier not knowing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
Anyway, guess I'd better find
my cat and get back home!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: Uh, sorry? Was that you, Alexandre?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: Yikes. Well, I guess that explains how you knew so much about the final emperor—you are him. Heck, you even froze yourself and guided Alex here as part of the ruse! Sooo... What happens now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Nothing at all. Nothing is what happens.
Why, did you expect me to make some grand 
cackling proclamation about how the empire
will be reborn or the like? No, the legend of the final emperor is long over,
so I'm simply going to take some time and
figure out how to best use this power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: Are you going to unfreeze everyone?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Of course. Well, except for the jerks who pissed
me off—they can stay frozen forever. ...Aaah ha ha! Kidding! Oh my god, your faces!
No, out of respect for all of Alexandre's
hard work, I intend to unfreeze everyone. This is all because of you, Alexandre.
You should be very proud.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
This is... No. None of this feels right.
I'm starting to understand why this place was
sealed away in the first place, and I don't
think we should let the emperor's power out.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
If that's what your intuition says,
I'm guessing it's right!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: *sigh* Do the two of you know what it means to 'overstep your bounds'? If not, please allow me to teach you right now—but know that the fee for the lesson will be your lives.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text:
...Alexandre? How strange. I was dreaming
I'd acquired the power of the final emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text: It was a dream, Leia. Just a dream.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Is it okay to leave things like this?
I mean, Leia doesn't remember anything.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
I don't know if the final emperor is gone or not,
but I don't think I'm strong enough to have
destroyed him outright—which means he could
very well come creeping around again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
And when that happens, someone will
have to stand and face him.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text: That someone may need to be you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
I don't know if I'm capable of that,
but I'll certainly try my best.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
With that attitude, you'll be great!
I just know it!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text: Uh, sorry? Was that you, Alexandre?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text: Yikes. Well, I guess that explains how you knew so much about the final emperor—you are him. Heck, you even froze yourself and guided Alex here as part of the ruse! Sooo... What happens now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Nothing at all. Nothing is what happens.
Why, who could possibly believe that the final
emperor might appear in this day and age? But though the empire is naught but an
anachronism at this point, the power here
can still be wielded in the modern day—
and in very modern ways.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text: Are you going to unfreeze everyone?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, that's right. There are still people
trapped in the ice, aren't there? Well, if you wish it, Alexandre, I will restore
them all. Otherwise, they will remain as they
are now. This choice belongs to you alone—
such is the essence of power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
This is... No. None of this feels right.
I'm starting to understand why this place was
sealed away in the first place, and I don't
think we should let the emperor's power out.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
If that's what your intuition says,
I'm guessing it's right!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
You two are more clever than I thought.
Only a fool would settle for being ruled
by such a power—the wise person chooses
to rule for themselves!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text: I never imagined it would end like this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
You did everything you could, so it's time
to hold your head high and start thinking
about the future. I'm sure that's what
Gabriel would have wanted.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
But is the emperor's power really gone?
Or will it be restored one day?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
Lemme answer that with a question:
What will you do if he DOES come back?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
I won't be ruled by that kind of thing.
I'll fight it with everything I have.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
With that attitude, you'll be great!
I just know it!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
So you come to me once more, my new sacrificial
lamb. You have been chosen; this monster that was
once hailed as emperor will now use your flesh to gain
a vast new power. And indeed, perhaps I will need to remain in
this land for the rest of time in order to
keep such a monstrous form at bay.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Pretty sure your lust for power is the reason
you ended up in that form in the first place,
so that's totally on you. Also, you're the emperor. Keeping nasty
stuff sealed away is, like, your job.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text: To protect Grelon, I must eliminate the infernal beings who come here from the Conjoined Worlds. This is why I require power—the blame for my actions rests entirely with you and your ilk!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text: Oh, way to jump to conclusions! Look, I admit not every outsider has the best intentions, but could you cut me a break and accept that I never meant your world any harm?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Then destroy this vile flesh and release my
tormented soul from its sealing duties.
For I am so very weary...

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
But if the soul of the final emperor has
been protecting Grelon this whole time,
who's going to do it when you're gone!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You have wisdom enough to know
the answer to that question.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Now, you infernal being!
Show me the nobility of your soul!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
The final emperor's soul has been freed.
But do you know the answer to the riddle
he asked at the end?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
I do. All of us who live in Grelon have to
take on the responsibility of protecting it.
It won't be easy, but it has to be done.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
You really are a great kid, Alexandre.
Thanks for giving me the peace of mind
to get back to doing what I need to do.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
Thank you for everything. Truly.
And good luck finding your cat!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
So my new form comes at last. Rejoice, for you
have been chosen! Your body has all I require:
compatibility with my soul, great magical power,
and the charm to inspire others. And now, my vessel, I would have you
offer unto me your flesh!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
Man, this palace is just one giant trap!
I knew I shouldn't have brought you here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
You get far away from here, okay?
Let me handle this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text: I'll not let you escape this time!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
Hey! Jerkface! Over here!
I'm the one you want!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
Hey, a cat! So the final emperor was feeding
off MY magic power!? I guess Macha's guidance
was on point this time.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
Seems like being expelled from Grelon was
also part of my destiny. I just hope Alexandre
is okay and that he finds a way to rescue all
the other frozen people.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Who seeks my power? Who has managed to
overcome the trial and enter my palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
So you're the true form of the
final emperor, huh? Yikes, man.
No wonder they sealed you away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Grant me your power! I beg it of you!
Become one with me, that I might
use your strength to save this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text: No, Leia! That won't save anything!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text: You mustn't judge a book by its cover, Alexandre. Besides, it will be me using this power.... Using it to save the world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
I admire your ambition! Now let us see
if your flesh is as strong as your will.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Nngh... So much...power...
surging through me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
We can't let any of the emperor's
power escape this place!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't do it, Alexandre... I couldn't
handle the power of the final emperor...

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
Well, if you need a job done,
you better ask a witch.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
Impudent fool! Do you think that was
all of the power I possessed!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text: Have a taste of my TRUE might!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
Sure felt like it. But much as I'd like to
promise he won't come back one day,
I can't. Sorry.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
No, that's okay. This is our problem now—so
if he does come back, we'll just defeat him.
We can't afford to let anyone be tempted
by that power ever again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
And as long as you're here,
I know you won't! But now
I have a job to get back to.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
Thank you for everything, Miss Aisling.
I hope I can grow into someone who's
half as strong as you are.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
No, thank YOU, Alexandre! Can't quite put
my finger on it, but I feel like I've learned
one of those valuable life lessons from
all this. Be good! Byeee!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Who seeks my power? Who has managed to
overcome the trial and enter my palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
So you're the true form of the
final emperor, huh? Yikes, man.
No wonder they sealed you away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Grant me your power! I beg it of you!
Become one with me, that I might use
your strength to bring order to this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Power is an ugly thing, Alexandre.
Freedom and kindness are beautiful, yes,
but beautiful things cannot maintain order
in this world. Only force can do that.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
You believe yourself ready for my power?
Good. Let us see if that is truly the case.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Nngh... So much...power...
surging through me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
We can't let any of the emperor's
power escape this place!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_010_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't handle the power of the
final emperor, Alexandre... But you...

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
Sure felt like it. But much as I'd like to
promise he won't come back one day,
I can't. Sorry.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
The lust for power is what kept the final
emperor alive for so long. That's something
we all have inside us—and something that
isn't ever going to change.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
Don't ever give into that, okay?
You fight it!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
I hope I can—but it helps I don't like
what it turned the emperor into.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
Well, that's something all of you in this
world will have to wrestle with. But as for
this girl, it's time to move on.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
So my new form comes at last. Rejoice, for you
have been chosen! Your body has all I require:
compatibility with my soul, great magical power,
and the charm to inspire others. And now, my vessel, I would have you
offer unto me your flesh!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Remember well the fiend that haunts this
place, Alexandre. For when this occurs again
someday, I want you to be the one to save
the children of the future.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
As for you, demon, the new form you sought
once before stands before you now.
Come and claim it, if you can!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text: I've no need of senile old fools. Begone!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Do not fear, child.
Soon, you will be mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
And as for you, my otherworldly visitor,
I will brook no interference from your ilk!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Grelon's fate is for its people to decide,
but Alexandre's future belongs to him—
and I won't let you take it away!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Bwaaa ha ha ha! Bold words indeed!
But have you the power to back them up?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I mean, it FEELS like he is,
but I can't swear his power
has left this world for good. This exact same catastrophe may come back
to Grelon one day—and if it does, you'll
need to resist it just like Romain did.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text: But I can't! I'll never be like Romain!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I mean, sure. You'll always be Alexandre,
just like Romain was always Romain.
But that just means you'll need to find
your own way to stand up to stuff.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I wish I had your confidence,
but...okay. I'll try.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I hope everyone got thawed now that the curse
is lifted, but I can't stick around to see,
'cause I have my own job to do. This is where our journey ends,
Alexandre. Thanks for everything.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't have done any of this without
you, Miss Aisling—and I'll be praying
that you find your cat!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
So you come to me once more, my new sacrificial
lamb. You have been chosen; this monster that was
once hailed as emperor will now use your flesh to gain
a vast new power. And indeed, perhaps I will need to remain in
this land for the rest of time in order to
keep such a monstrous form at bay.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
I have heard these words before, Alexandre—on
the day my father sent me fleeing from this palace.
And I have spent every day since thinking about
how to release the emperor from his fate.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
It is time to follow in my father's footsteps.
Expel your exhausted self from that body and
claim mine instead! Then empower its flesh so
I might seize command of this world from you!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
I don't understand what you're saying,
Romain! I don't understand at all!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text: Now it is your turn, Alexandre.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
You said this was a trap, Romain,
and you were right—because you're
the jerk who set it!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
Technically true—but there's still no way
I'm going to let you hurt Alexandre!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
Where did I go wrong? All I ever wanted
was to release the final emperor...

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
I am a sinful man. A horror.
There can be no absolution for this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
The final emperor and Romain are both gone.
Did... Did I do the wrong thing?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
No way! Because of you, the fiend that
was fused to the emperor is gone,
which means the curse has been lifted. You did the exact RIGHT thing,
Alexandre! You saved everyone!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
...I guess I did, huh? I mean, it really does
feel like a weight's been lifted off me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
The door's locked. Isn't there
some way we can get it open?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Something's here, Alexandre.
Get behind me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Fiends tend to nest in the darkness
in my world. I wonder if that's true
in this one as well.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
The fiends are here because of the curse!
Grelon's a peaceful place, I swear!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Yeah, I don't think this
shack is safe yet.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I think it does! Now let's get
that cable car moving again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
We can use this to get to the ski slope
or down to the bottom of the hill!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text: Miss Aisling! The ice is changing!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Changing into a fiend?
Okay, buddy. Let's do this!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
I've never seen a real-life fiend before!
People said they roam around in caves and mines,
but I always thought those were just stories
made up to scare children.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
I wonder if this is connected
to the emperor's curse.

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.text: Huh!? The ice is turning into a fiend again!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.text:
Get a new trick, ice fiend!
You can't surprise me anymore!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.text: Enough with this ice fiend business!

SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_FUNC_AMYA_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.text:
I know, right? But don't worry,
I'll make quick work of 'em!

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_000.text: You seen a cat around here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The emperors of yore were said to have
cherished felines. What do you intend
to do with one if you find it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Morgane
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I don't think I've ever seen
a cat around the slopes.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Eric
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, I guess fiends sometimes appear
in the mines. Is that what you mean?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, sure! I have a lot of cats.
I use them to deal with the mice
and drive away annoying birds.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Um, I was frozen solid until,
like, a few seconds ago?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Virgile
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_060.text:
There are all manner of
cats over thereabouts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Cats come in a great many breeds,
but they are of no interest to me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Ah, I used to have a cat.
But that was some twenty years ago.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Remi
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_090.text: You're asking me about a cat? Are you trying to pick a fight?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Some people believe there are
beings that cannot be perceived
by the naked eye.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Sandrine
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_110.text: I'm more of a dog person.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Here you are! I wonder if
you've been frozen too.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I wonder if the incident on this world was
somehow connected to the magical balance of
the Conjoined Worlds. I mean, could that be
the entire reason I was guided here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.text:
I wonder why I was guided to Alexandre...
Man, sometimes Macha's magic makes
zero sense to me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.text:
Do you want to join me
on my journey, Guillaume?

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.text:
If you think I could be of assistance,
I'm happy to come along.

SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Amaya_Aisling
SUB_W12_EVAR_AMYA_ESPERANCE_000_CUT_000_.text: Care to join me on my journey?
